import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from"../context/AuthContext";import SearchBar from"../components/SearchBar";import LanguageSwitcher from"../components/LanguageSwitcher";import{getNearestOffices}from"../services/officeService";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const{t,i18n}=useTranslation();const[offices,setOffices]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();// Fetch closest rental offices
